name: Space Mafness
description:
Controls:

WASD - Movement (It's absolute (not character-relative) movement btw!)
Jump - Right Click / Right Shift
Shoot - Left Click / Enter

You are a friendly alien on a diplomatic mission when you happen to accidentally insult an entire civilization! Shoot shells to 'clam down' your incoming attackers but be careful, your ship is about to break apart!

Created for NSI Game Jam 11! Theme: Mad World.
